cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("PlaygroundGUI")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


set(PlaygroundGUI_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/PlaygroundGUI/PlaygroundGUI.jucer"
)

# Set Automaton Core dir only if it wasn't set before
if(NOT DEFINED AUTOMATON_CORE_DIR)
  set(AUTOMATON_CORE_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../automaton")
endif()

set(AUTOMATON_PLAYGROUND_GUI_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/PlaygroundGUI")

)
